sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-hover v-slot="{hover}" open-delay="200">
    <v-card :elevation="hover ? 16:2" :class="{'on-hover': hover}">
        <router-link :to="`/movie/${movie.id}`">
        <v-img :src="posterPath" alt="" class=""></v-img>
    </router-link>
    <v-card-title class="subtitle-2">{{ movie }}</v-card-title>
    </v-card>
    </v-hover>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    props: {
        movie: {
            required: true,
        },
        genres: {
            required: true,
        }
    },
    computed: {
        posterPath(){
            return "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/" + this.movie.poster_path
        }
    },
    methods: {
        genretypeName(geraId, index){
            for(const item of this.genres){
                if(item.id == geraId){
                    if(this.movie.genre_ids.length - 1 == index){
                        return item.namel
                    }else{
                        return item.name + ",";
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
